item.title: Quicktip: Send output to clipboard
item.description: Ever found yourself wanting to copy the output from a command to your clipboard without having to select it first? Or maybe copy the contents of a file, like a config file? In this short article we’re going to cover how to do that in Windows, MacOS and Linux with Powershell. The powershell way Powershell 7 has a built-in cross platform cmdlet for both getting and setting your clipboard. PS> "Hello, World!
